languages.text: "В богадельнях имени фон Валанциус еду раздают — за просто так! Мои сорванцы чуть от счастья не разрыдались, когда я домой целых два питбрикета принес..."

traits.locale_text: [Драфт] Клёвая барка про достаток и спокойствие

languages.text: "They're handing out food for free in the von Valancius poorhouses! My little rascals almost burst into tears of joy when I brought home two whole nutribars..."
languages.original_text: "В богадельнях имени фон Валанциус еду раздают — за просто так! Мои сорванцы чуть от счастья не разрыдались, когда я домой целых два питбрикета принес..."

traits.locale_text: "They're handing food out for free in the von Valancius poorhouses! My little rascals almost burst into tears of joy when I brought home a whole two nutribars..."

"They're handing out food for free in the von Valancius poorhouses! My little rascals almost burst into tears of joy when I brought home two whole nutribars..."

languages.text: “冯·瓦兰修斯救济院那些人在免费发放食物。当我把整整两条营养条拿回家的时候，家里的那群小崽子都快要开心哭了……”
languages.original_text: "They're handing out food for free in the von Valancius poorhouses! My little rascals almost burst into tears of joy when I brought home two whole nutribars..."

traits.locale_text: “冯·瓦兰修斯救济院那些人在免费发放食物。当我把整整两条营养条拿回家的时候，家里的那群小崽子都快要开心哭了……”

languages.text: 「フォン・ヴァランシウスの救貧院で、無料で食事を配布しているぞ！私が栄養バーを丸々二本持って帰った時、うちのわんぱく小僧たちは嬉し泣きをしそうだったよ…」
languages.original_text: "They're handing out food for free in the von Valancius poorhouses! My little rascals almost burst into tears of joy when I brought home two whole nutribars..."

traits.locale_text: 「フォン・ヴァランシウスの救貧院で、無料で食事を配布しているぞ！私が栄養バーを丸々二本持って帰った時、うちのわんぱく小僧たちは嬉し泣きをしそうだったよ…」

languages.text: «¡Están repartiendo comida gratis en las casas para pobres de von Valancius! Mis pequeños granujas casi se echan a llorar de alegría cuando llevé a casa dos barritas de nutrientes enteras...».
languages.original_text: "They're handing out food for free in the von Valancius poorhouses! My little rascals almost burst into tears of joy when I brought home two whole nutribars..."

traits.locale_text: «¡Están repartiendo comida gratis en las casas para pobres de von Valancius! Mis pequeños granujas casi se echan a llorar de alegría cuando llevé a casa dos barritas de nutrientes enteras...».

languages.text: "In den Armenhäusern der Dynastie von Valancius wird kostenloses Essen verteilt! Meine kleinen Racker haben vor Freude fast geweint, als ich mit zwei ganzen Nutririegeln nach Hause gekommen bin ..."
languages.original_text: "They're handing out food for free in the von Valancius poorhouses! My little rascals almost burst into tears of joy when I brought home two whole nutribars..."

traits.locale_text: "In den Armenhäusern der Dynastie von Valancius wird kostenloses Essen verteilt! Meine kleinen Racker haben vor Freude fast geweint, als ich mit zwei ganzen Nutririegeln nach Hause gekommen bin ..."

languages.text: « Dans les refuges von Valancius, ils distribuent gratuitement de la nourriture ! Mes deux chenapans étaient fous de joie quand j'ai rapporté deux nutribarres entières à la maison... »
languages.original_text: "They're handing out food for free in the von Valancius poorhouses! My little rascals almost burst into tears of joy when I brought home two whole nutribars..."

traits.locale_text: « Dans les refuges von Valancius, ils distribuent gratuitement de la nourriture ! Mes deux chenapans étaient fous de joie quand j'ai rapporté deux nutribarres entières à la maison... »

languages.text: "Von Valancius düşkünlerevlerinde bedava yemek dağıtıyorlar! Benim küçük veletler, eve iki bütün besinbarla döndüklerinde neredeyse mutluluktan ağlayacaktı."
languages.original_text: "They're handing out food for free in the von Valancius poorhouses! My little rascals almost burst into tears of joy when I brought home two whole nutribars..."

traits.locale_text: "Von Valancius düşkünlerevlerinde bedava yemek dağıtıyorlar! Benim küçük veletler, eve iki bütün besinbar götürdüğümde neredeyse mutluluktan ağlayacaktı."
